items.sentence: Even though Tom left home early today, he was late for work.
I wish I had eaten at that restaurant before it burned down.
My father was the same age I am now when he moved to Boston.
Someone is standing behind the bushes taking pictures of us.
We need to get this truck unloaded before it starts raining.
You can go play with your friends when your chores are done.
The suspect was hiding out in the mountains for three weeks.
There was no other choice but to abandon the entire project.
Tom and I planted some trees on the south side of the house.
Tom and Mary combined their money to buy a present for John.
Tom asked Mary when the last time she had bought a book was.
Tom asked Mary whether she knew what she was supposed to do.
Tom admitted that he was the one who stole Mary\'s bracelet.
Tom and Mary acted like they\'d never met each other before.
Do you really think I\'d rather live in Boston than Chicago?
Do you want me to talk to Tom about what\'s going to happen?
I can\'t believe your parents let you come here by yourself.
Mary\'s stew was so delicious that Tom had a second helping.
Everyone should periodically receive a physical examination.
Fortunately, today Tom is much better than he was yesterday.
